abstract: This week's Poetry Pairing matches "sorrows" by Lucille Clifton with "Loyal Companion Helps a Veteran Regain Her Life After War Trauma," an article about a former Navy officer whose service dog has helped her with the depression, sleeplessness and anxiety caused by post-traumatic stress disorder.
